To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron/Firestarter/Sixshot/Ares/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee:



Unitron received orders, and was intent on filling them out, especially after 
this.  "Zardus is a traitor.  If we do not survive this, we will be reborn.  
I may do something strange my allies, but only focus on freeing ourselves."

Unitron and the rest got to a far corner of the room, two tendrils extending 
from his forehead, boring into the back of Sixshot and Ares' heads.

---

Firestarter transformed to tank mode, letting loose three sonic shells at a 
corner of the room.

---

Sixshot took out a missile launcher, firing a missile at the same corner.

---

Ares fired off three laser bolts from his rifle at the same corner.

---

Double Punch raised a pincher, firing two missiles at the same corner.  
Raising his tail, he fired off a burst of acid at the same spot.

---

Manterror raised his left arm, firing off three ion disks at the same corner.

---

Injector raised a missile launcher, firing two stinger missiles at the corner.

---

Bumblebee coughed, being the weakest, and was losing concentration.

---
